TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlDirective extends System.Xaml.XamlMember

summary.span: 提供 XAML 型別系統識別項給某個成員 (如果此成員也是 XAML 指示詞的話)。

span.span: Provides the XAML type system identifier for a member if the member is also a XAML directive.

summary.span: XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器會在處理成員節點期間使用 識別項。

span.span: XAML readers and XAML writers use the identifier during processing of member nodes.

summary.span: 當 XAML 讀取器位在 上，而且 為 時，會使用這個識別項。

span.span: The identifier is used when the XAML reader is positioned on a and is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當成員是 XAML 指示詞 XAML 類型系統提供預期的值。 provides expected values for the XAML type system when the member is a XAML directive. 根據定義，XAML 指示詞具有特性，會一律傳回相同的結果子集屬性和相同的 XAML 類型系統資訊針對報告的所有可能的 XAML 指示詞。By definition, a XAML directive has characteristics that always return the same results for a subset of the properties, and the same XAML type system information is reported for all possible XAML directives. 報告的 XAML 類型系統特性所特有指示詞來完成，或透過覆寫的內部行為來`Lookup*`中的虛擬成員類別。The reporting of XAML type system characteristics that are specific to directives is accomplished by internal behavior or through overrides of `Lookup*` virtual members in the class. 下列清單顯示傳回的結果的 XAML 指示詞的成員時實際:The following list shows the returned results of a XAML directive for when the member is actually a : - 一定是`null`。 is always `null`. - 一定是`null`。 is always `null`. - 一定是`null`。 is always `null`. - 一定是`false`。 is always `false`. - 一定是`false`。 is always `false`. - 一定是`true`。 is always `true`. - 一定是`false`。 is always `false`. - 一定是`false`。 is always `false`. - 一定是`true`。 is always `true`. - 一定是`true`。 is always `true`. 此外，針對內部備份仍未設定，並傳回`null`。Also, the internal backing for remains unset and returns `null`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 是子類別。 is a subclass. 如同，具有 XAML 類型系統報告的方式，存取有關的安全性考量。As with , has security considerations regarding how the XAML type system reports access. 請參閱 。See .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The identifying name of the .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並在其中指定名稱和單一 XAML 命名空間的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying values for a name and a single XAML namespace.

summary.span: 請只有當您想要或預期 會針對指示詞報告 時，才使用這個簽章。

span.span: Use this signature only when you want or expect to report for the directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此簽章的建構函式一律會產生指示詞的識別碼其中報表`true`之 xaml 類型系統。This signature of the constructor always generates an identifier for the directive where reports `true` for the XAML type system. 如果所需的資訊可用 （支援類型和轉換的文字語法的資訊項目），而且您想可以套用指示詞，可使用的識別項建構函式簽章改為。If the necessary information is available (the backing type and a text syntax information item for conversion) and you want an identifier that can apply the directive, use the constructor signature instead. 如果您使用此簽章，值執行個體是; 而值和值都`null`。If you use this signature, the value for the instance is ; and the value and value are both `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此值建構函式簽章。You can set this value in the constructor signature. 如果您使用建構建構函式簽章，值執行個體是。If you construct by using the constructor signature, the value for the instance is . 不過，執行個體會永遠回報為`true`。However, the instance always reports as `true`. 這種行為通常會影響嘗試寫入物件圖形，並也會影響其他實際用途的值。This behavior typically affects attempts to write object graphs and also affects other practical uses of a value. 您通常會不會建構 XAML 指示詞的情況下其中是。You typically would not construct a XAML directive case where is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> GetXamlNamespaces() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetXamlNamespaces () As IList(Of String)

summary.span: 傳回這個 XAML 成員可能存在之 XAML 命名空間的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of XAML namespaces where this XAML member can exist.

returns.span: XAML 命名空間識別項的清單 (字串形式)。

span.span: A list of XAML namespace identifiers, as strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 命名空間識別碼是通常會出現在根據一般慣例的 XAML 和 XML 命名空間的統一資源識別元 (URI) 字串形式的字串。The XAML namespace identifiers are strings that typically appear in the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) string form according to the usual conventions for XAML and XML namespaces. 如果清單包含一個以上的項目，在集合中的第一個項目通常是相關主要 XAML 命名空間進行處理，和其他項目會替代項目。If the list contains more than one item, the first item in the set is usually the relevant primary XAML namespace for processing purposes, and the other items are alternates. 依賴此順序。 relies on this ordering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為 XAML 指示詞不能有自訂屬性，這個實作一律會傳回`null`。Because a XAML directive cannot have custom attributes, this implementation always returns `null`. 根據此虛擬的成員;因此，所有類型和所有預先定義的 XAML 指示詞必須使用這種行為。 seals this virtual member; therefore, all types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
